sentences.english: Then stand up and do some knee raises and toe touches.
sentences.chinese: 然后站起来足尖着地做一些曲膝动作。

sentences.english: Who would've thought he was a toe tapper?
sentences.chinese: 谁会想到他是一名足尖敲击者呢？

sentences.english: Extra reinforced toe, heel, and heel pocket for more durability.
sentences.chinese: 加强了的足尖，脚跟和脚跟里部，更耐穿。

sentences.english: Who would have thought he was a toe tapper?
sentences.chinese: 谁会想到他是一名足尖敲击者呢？

sentences.english: The trees, like the longings of the earth, stand a - tiptoe to peep at the heaven.
sentences.chinese: 森林，仿佛是大地的渴望，踮起足尖窥视天堂。

sentences.english: Hindquarters should have strong propelling power. Toeing in or out is to be faulted.
sentences.chinese: 后躯驱动力强，足尖向内或向外翻属于缺陷。

sentences.english: Dancing is the poetry of the foot.
sentences.chinese: 舞蹈是足尖舞动的美丽诗篇。

definition: you (used to a superior or between persons of the same generation)/below the foot
to sway one's hips/to twist one's waist
to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
to step on/to tread on/to wear (shoes)/(slang) to dump (sb)/Taiwan pr. [deng4]
